title: Meal App
description: Developed a meal app using vanilla JavaScript to search, store, and manage favorite meals with TheMeal API integration.

title: Authentication System
description: Created a secure system with email and Google login, password encryption, and reset functionalities.

title: Issue Tracker
description: Built a Node.js and EJS app for tracking bugs with project management, issue creation, and filtering features.

title: Hospital API
description: Node.js and MongoDB API for hospital management with doctor login, patient registration and secure report creation.
